document.full_text: former gov. rod r. blagojevich of illinois is scheduled to get a new trial this week, eight months after proceedings ended with a jury divided on most of the corruption counts against him.
document.title: political memo: mixed feelings for blagojevich retrial, none of them happy
lines_and_colors: former gov. rod r. blagojevich of illinois is scheduled to get a new trial this week, eight months after proceedings ended with a jury divided on most of the corruption counts against him.
